name: The Docks
description: Constantly active with ships arriving and departing. The docks are the lifeblood of New Cove, handling travel, trade, and sea-based contracts. The creaking of ships, calls of sailors, and the endless motion of the sea create a vibrant atmosphere. This is where you first arrived on the Refound Continent. Near a mooring post, a rain-dark barrel of driftwood sticks sits out for anyone desperate enough to arm themselves.

interactables.name: barrel of sticks
interactables.examine_text: A battered barrel packed with salt-bleached driftwood. The sticks are straight enough to swing, splintery enough to regret.

take.empty_text: The barrel's been picked clean for now.
